text: Tɨkatɨka kuyundu mirɨmba naŋga Farisi narɨ, narɨ pɨmɨ aru kavɨrɨmandɨra. Narɨ kuyusɨhɨrɨmbɨhapɨha ŋɨnɨŋ. Narɨ pɨrɨvɨsa naŋga añakɨŋguku muvumuvu kɨndaŋgɨnda andɨhara, mɨnzavat mɨŋgandaya narɨŋandɨ sɨmbɨrasara mɨŋga yɨvurahandi. Kamata narɨŋ nu ñamba vanarɨm taratɨvɨramaŋgarandi. Kamataharɨm narɨ ahutuvarandi helɨyɨ urɨmandɨra maña, nu ndahara urɨmandɨ.
